paper_abstract: We first consider subsmoothness for a function family and provide formulas of the subdifferential of the pointwise supremum of a family of subsmooth functions. Next, we consider subsmooth infinite and semi-infinite optimization problems. In particular, we provide several dual and primal characterizations for a point to be a sharp minimum or a weak sharp minimum for such optimization problems.
paper_title: Subsmooth semi-infinite and infinite optimization problems
